name: Meeting hours
description: Meeting hours are from 11 to 17 Kyiv time

name: Being a professional
description: Best practice = professional approach + friendly atmosphere

name: Direct feedback
description: Practice direct feedback

name: E-mails & invitations
description: Check your e-mails at least once a day and send responses to invitations!

name: Respect
description: Respect your colleagues

name: All-Hands and weekly meetings
description: Weekly meetings are for everyone + all-hands

name: Working hours
description: Came early? Write a [time] e-mail when leaving

name: Timeliness
description: Start, finish and come to the meetings on time

name: Strong language
description: Avoid using strong language at the office

name: Kitchen
description: Wash your dishes and clean the kitchen after yourself: tables, fridge and cupboards

name: Device tracker
description: Mandatory: reserve a device on the Device Tracker page

name: Turn off
description: Turn off a device before leaving it on the shelf when finished using it

name: Entertainment
description: Distractions & entertainment should not be parallel with work

name: Meetings are priority
description: Do not bother people at the meeting

name: Keeping to the point
description: Keep your discussions relevant (no non-related topics)

name: Knowledge share
description: Share your knowledge

name: Noise
description: Reduce the noise level in the open space

name: Preparation
description: Prepare to the meetings and create them with a comprehensible agenda

name: Messengers
description: Check HipChat and other communication channels at least once a day

name: Sounds & music
description: Test the sounds only in headphones. Turn off the sound in the headphones when leaving your working place

name: Charge
description: Put a device on charge when leaving it in the cell

name: No OS update
description: Do not update the OS

name: Ringtones
description: Switch off phone ringtones

name: Respect & Politeness
description: Cleaning after yourself is a common courtesy

name: Private talks Vs. Work talks
description: Hold all telephone and private talks in the meeting rooms

name: Vacation
description: Going on vacation? Put it into semesterlistan in advance!

name: Bathrooms
description: Keep it clean. You know what we mean

name: Meeting-free Wednesday
description: Wednesday is meeting-free

name: Time tag
description: Late, leaving early or OOO? Yes. Write a [TIME] e-mail
